description:
Tomorrow`s field day!  I`m at school practicing the night before!
Huh?  Daddy?  Where`d you come from?  The house?
I`m not supposed to go out on my own at night?  I`m sorry...
But I just couldn`t sit still knowing tomorrow`s field dat!
I thought I`d do a rehearsal!
Will you help too daddy?  Great!  We`ll start with the opening parade!
Then the obstacle course!
Then the tug-of-war, the piggyback battle, and the relay!
Mmm...first place...zzzzz...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boushi to Pantsu wa Kaburu Tame ni Aru!?
Hats and Underwear Go on Your Head!
帽子とパンツはかぶるためにある!?
